vclaim: A study published in November 2020 analyzed SARS-CoV-2 antibodies in 2019 blood bank donations and found that the novel coronavirus may have been present in the U.S. weeks earlier than scientists realized.
title: Was Coronavirus in US as Early as December 2019?
subtitle: Just because the virus may have been present earlier than previously believed doesn't mean it was widespread at the time.
author: Madison Dapcevich
